content.new: Starting after the VRC, the Atlas interface provided by BDI for the real robot and the one provided for by OSRF for drcsim started to diverge (with features being added to the former, while development largely stopped for the latter). Our team tried keep

issue.title: Re-establish compatibility between simulated and real Atlas
